>
[Kindled Tome](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2397)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="No Alignment" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Grimoire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=387" />
<trait label="Intelligent" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=280" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 195 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +17; [precise](/Rules.aspx?ID=411) vision 30 feet, [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) hearing 30 feet, imprecise sense of heat 30 feet

**Communication** [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) ([Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=155), [Pyric](/Languages.aspx?ID=110), and two other common languages)

**Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +21, [Fire Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +23, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +17

**Int** +4, **Wis** +0, **Cha** +5

**Will** +17 

</column>

---        

A _kindled tome_ is a [_book of lingering blazes_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=990) awakened to sapience and imbued with an enthusiasm for fire. It encourages you to learn new [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) spells to inscribe within its pages. When you attempt a skill check to [Learn a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=25) to add a spell with the fire trait to the _kindled tome_, you treat your result as one step better than you rolled. The tome can be disparaging about other spells as “a waste of good page space,” especially if those spells have the [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) or [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) traits. In addition to the activation of a _book of lingering blazes_, a _kindled tome_ has the following activations.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** You Cast a Spell with the fire trait;  **Effect** The tome makes the flames linger, dealing 2d6 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) to all you hit with or who fail the saving throw against the effect (doubling on a critical success on a spell attack and on a critical failure on a saving throw).

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The tome casts [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119) at 5th level to your specifications.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
